questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Abstract art and urban scenes
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a park
B) On a beach
C) On a street
D) Inside a building

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A busy market scene
B) A street scene
C) A sports event
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person walking
B) A building
C) A car's side mirror reflection
D) A tree

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A car's side mirror
C) A tree
D) A signboard

What is depicted in the car's side mirror reflection?
A) A playground
B) A mural
C) A traffic light
D) A pedestrian

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A beach
C) Buildings with colorful murals
D) A park

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bicycle
B) A car's side mirror
C) A bench
D) A streetlight

What type of mural is visible in the reflection?
A) A landscape painting
B) An abstract art piece
C) A colorful animal mural
D) A portrait

What is the text visible on the car's side mirror?
A) "Caution: Wet floor"
B) "Objects in mirror are closer than they appear"
C) "No parking"
D) "Speed limit 30 mph"

What type of animal is depicted in the mural?
A) A horse
B) A bull
C) A bird
D) A fish

What colors are prominent in the mural?
A) Black and white
B) Green and blue
C) Red and yellow
D) Multiple colors

What is the condition of the car's side mirror?
A) Clean and new
B) Dirty and worn
C) Broken and damaged
D) Shiny and polished

What is the dominant color of the building in the reflection?
A) Red
B) Green
C) White
D) Blue

What kind of vehicle is partially visible in the reflection?
A) A bicycle
B) A motorcycle
C) A car
D) A truck

What is the primary subject of the mural?
A) Nature
B) A person
C) An animal
D) A cityscape

What is the function of the text on the car's side mirror?
A) To provide a warning or Instruction
B) To advertise a product
C) To give directions
D) To display a quote

What element adds an artistic touch to the urban scene in the reflection?
A) The car
B) The street
C) The mural
D) The building

How does the mural contribute to the overall scene?
A) It adds color and vibrancy
B) It blends in with the background
C) It is barely noticeable
D) It creates a sense of chaos

What is the significance of the text on the mirror?
A) It is a safety warning or instruction
B) It is an advertisement
C) It is a decorative element
D) It is a random phrase

What can be seen on the street behind the car?
A) Pedestrians
B) Another car
C) A bicycle
D) A bus

What artistic style is the mural in?
A) Realistic
B) Abstract
C) Impressionistic
D) Minimalist

What is the purpose of the side mirror in the photo?
A) To enhance the car's appearance
B) To provide a view of the rear
C) To show the car's interior
D) To display advertisements

What is the main color of the car's side mirror?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) Grey

What is the visual effect created by the reflection in the side mirror?
A) It distorts the image
B) It creates a double image
C) It provides a clear view of back side
D) It blurs the image

What is the relationship between the car and the mural in the photo?
A) The car is parked in front of the mural
B) The car is driving past the mural
C) The car is reflecting the mural
D) The car is blocking the mural

What is the main theme of the mural?
A) Nature and wildlife
B) Urban life
C) Historical events
D) Abstract concepts

What is the dominant visual element in the reflection?
A) The car mirror with mural
B) The mural
C) The street
D) The building

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A building
B) A car's side mirror
C) A pedestrian
D) A tree

What is depicted in the mural seen in the photo?
A) A landscape
B) An animal
C) A person
D) A vehicle

What does the text in the mirror say?
A) "Objects in mirror are closer than they appear"
B) "Caution: Wet floor"
C) "No parking"
D) "Speed limit: 30 mph"

What type of vehicle is seen in the mirror reflection?
A) A bicycle
B) A motorcycle
C) A car
D) A bus

What is the color of the building where the mural is painted?
A) Blue
B) White
C) Green
D) Red
